scenes.key_takeaway: Born in Chicago's Warehouse club in the early 80s
scenes.visual_idea: Vintage footage of Chicago skyline and vinyl records spinning

scenes.key_takeaway: The iconic Roland TR-909 drum machine defined the sound
scenes.visual_idea: Close-up of a TR-909 beat being programmed

scenes.key_takeaway: It was all about inclusion, love, and the underground
scenes.visual_idea: Diverse crowd dancing euphorically in a dark club
